name: Trinity of the Virtuous
description:
Pretty short RPG Maker game that I spent some hours on. The game is still unfinished and I likely won't work on it again so enjoy what I have so far. 

Controls: Z to interact, X to go back, Shift to run, and Shift + B to skip through text.

Credits:

"Vampire Prayer" theme, used in The Curse battle.
"Forgotten Place" theme, used in Snakefang Wastes.

"Mysty-Valley" theme, used in Abathal Bandit Hideout.

Some monster sprites are from Avery, Themo, Chalkdust, Whtdragon, MoonlightsShadowLove, Pixel Brady, Makio-Kuta, Enterbrain, and Kazzador.
